title: Bosch SEPIA SPDX JSON Schema Version 1.00
description: JSON Schema for validation of mandatory SPDX SBoM metadata. Copyright Â© 2024 Bosch Sicherheitssysteme GmbH. All rights reserved. Licensed under the CC-BY License, Version 4.0

spdxVersion.title: specVersion
spdxVersion.description: MANDATORY. Version (spdxVersion) of the used SBOM specification.

created.title: timestamp
created.description: MANDATORY. Creation date (created) of SBoM document must be non-empty

creators.title: creators
creators.description: MANDATORY. Array of creators (creators) must contain at least two items Organization and Person

documentNamespace.title: serialNumber
documentNamespace.description: MANDATORY. Serial number (documentNamespace) of SBoM document must be non-empty

dataLicense.title: dataLicense
dataLicense.description: MANDATORY. License of SBoM data (dataLicense) must be non-empty

name.title: component.name
name.description: MANDATORY. Name of SBoM document (name) must be non-empty

packages.title: packages
packages.description: MANDATORY. Array of packages (packages) must contain at least one item (Bosch Product)

relationships.title: relationships
relationships.description: MANDATORY. Array of relationships (relationships) must contain at least one item (DESCRIBES relation of Bosch Product).

hasExtractedLicensingInfos.title: hasExtractedLicensingInfos
hasExtractedLicensingInfos.description: MANDATORY. License texts (hasExtractedLicensingInfos) for licenses that are not a not verbatim copy of an SPDX license text.

creator.title: metadata.authors.author.name
creator.description: MANDATORY. Creator string (creator) must be non-empty

primaryPackagePurpose.title: component.type
primaryPackagePurpose.description: MANDATORY. Component type (primaryPackagePurpose) must be non-empty

versionInfo.title: component.version
versionInfo.description: MANDATORY. Version of package (versionInfo) must be non-empty

externalRefs.title: purl
externalRefs.description: MANDATORY. External component references (externalRefs) must at least contain one PURL

supplier.title: supplier.name
supplier.description: MANDATORY. Supplier name (supplier) must be non-empty

checksums.title: checksums
checksums.description: MANDATORY. Checksums array (checksums) with at least one item must be given

name.title: name
name.description: MANDATORY. Name of component (name) must be non-empty

licenseDeclared.title: licenses.license.name
licenseDeclared.description: MANDATORY. Declared license (licenseDeclared) must be non-empty

copyrightText.title: copyright
copyrightText.description: MANDATORY. Copyright text (copyrightText) must be non-empty

summary.title: description
summary.description: OPTIONAL. Description for the component (summary) must be non-empty if existing

downloadLocation.title: package.download.location
downloadLocation.description: OPTIONAL. Package download location (downloadLocation) must be non-empty uri if existing

referenceCategory.title: referenceCategory
referenceCategory.description: MANDATORY. referenceCategory must be non-empty if given

referenceLocator.title: referenceLocator
referenceLocator.description: MANDATORY. CPE / PURL must be non-empty if given

referenceType.title: referenceType
referenceType.description: MANDATORY. referenceType must be non-empty if given

algorithm.title: algorithm
algorithm.description: MANDATORY. hash algorithm (algorithm) must be non-empty if given

checksumValue.title: checksumValue
checksumValue.description: MANDATORY. hash value (checksumValue) must be non-empty if given

relationship.title: relationship
relationship.description: MANDATORY. If relationship is given, all relationship properties are mandatory

licensingInfos.title: licensingInfos
licensingInfos.description: MANDATORY. If licensing info is given, all licensing info properties are mandatory

licenseId.title: licenses.license.id
licenseId.description: MANDATORY. Either license ID (licenseId) or license name must be non-empty

name.title: licenses.license.name
name.description: MANDATORY. Either license name (name) or license ID must be non-empty

extractedText.title: licenses.license.text
extractedText.description: MANDATORY. License text (extractedText) must be non-empty
